name: dailybeautypick
0:
”Alexa, open daily beauty pick”
”Alexa, start daily beauty pick”
”Alexa, launch daily beauty pick”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily beauty pick
Developer Terms of Use
des:
What if you could effortlessly discover and shop personalised beauty products every day, with just the help of Alexa?

Imagine a stress-free morning routine and confidently discovering curated beauty items suited to your skin tone and type without any hassle.

It sounds like a dream, but just imagine waking up to your Alexa to find a new, perfectly matched beauty product waiting for you. You can see product previews, watch videos, read reviews, and even ask questions using cutting-edge generative AI technology for instant answers. With a single tap, you can seamlessly add the product to your Amazon cart or make an instant purchase – no need to input credit card details or fill out your address.

And that's not all – you can get a beauty shopping experience that fits into your day, making it easier than ever to explore, select, and purchase beauty products perfect for you.

This skill uses Alexa Shopping to make purchases on Amazon. Alexa allows purchasing by voice using your default payment and shipping settings. You can set a voice confirmation code, turn off purchasing, and see product and order details in your Alexa app.

The selection of recommended products are not influenced by agreements or relationships with specific product brands. This selection does not imply endorsement or assurance of product performance by the application developer. Brand agreements do not affect the choice or recommendation of the products surfaced. The inclusion of brands and related products are selected by independent beauty professionals who are impartial to brands and their related products.

priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
